VPMemoryObj Class Reference

A "Memory Object" is a VPAT object that has some memory allocation attributes, allowing VPAT to auto dealocate its memory space. More...

Detailed Description

A "Memory Object" is a VPAT object that has some memory allocation attributes, allowing VPAT to auto dealocate its memory space.
